scripts.pkg: npm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && pkg --targets node16-linux-x64,node16-linuxstatic-x64,node16-win-x64,node16-macos-x64,node16-linux-arm64,node16-linuxstatic-arm64,node16-win-arm64,node16-macos-arm64 --compress Brotli --out-path ./dist src/index.js
scripts.publish: git tag -a "$TAG" -m "Release $TAG" && gh release create "$TAG" --title "Release $TAG" --notes "$NOTES" -R https://github.com/FreshPenguin112/pangscript ./dist/* && rm -rf ./dist
